pullRequest.title: Early access build
pullRequest.bodyText: Please find the latest PR with our Internal QA issue fixes and Copy Right Symbol issue fix .

commit.message: Added valid value for Client ID and Secret Key for WCP Application. Also added property for send notification url and resolved copy right symbol issue
Copy Right issue fixes and added few properties into the property files
Internal QA issue fixes
Modified the property details as per the actial api url
Internal QA issue fixes and removed the api from interceptor url to by pass the auth server calls
Internal QA issue Fixes
Internal QA issue Fixes
Internal QA issue fixes
Modified the branch name in .yml file as the existing branch name modifed to new one and also added .yml file for Auth server build
Changed the workflow name and removed  duplicate declaration of version
Added maven dependency for apns-1.0.0.Beta6.jar

nodes.bodyText: It might make sense to either use wildcard for branch name, or simply use branch-ignore if the goal is to exclude certain other branches

nodes.bodyText: would this code allow validation of a service with another service's credential? i.e. RS with WCP id and secret or vice versa?

are these pwsIds sequential?
I am guessing these are database Ids and sequential, so is it possible to just fetch them in an ordered manner and not do a post sort instead?

nit: please rename to health controller.
with "/health" mapping for service health check.
thanks for addressing all these issues!
nit: should we change this to client credentials to be consistent with other auth errors?
is this a test file? if yes, should it moved to the test directory instead?
I realize this is out of scope of this PR, but I would like to identify if there is an area for improvement in later stages.
why is this needed?
please remove commented code.
please remove

please do not log client id

nit: previous format was: StudiesServicesImpl.SendNotificationAction() - Starts

this code is very complicated and hard to follow; it is not clear if all cases are covered.
Moving the code into smaller functions or even simplifying some of the condition combinations into variable or methods might improve the readability of this block.
please remove these across the project
please remove commented code

can this be turned into an early exit? e.g.
 if (notificationBean.getDeviceToken() == null) return;
these headers are repeated three times; please extract them into a separate method
should be an error
nit: typo withdrawParticipantFromStudy
please log this as an error as well.

response server issue fixes based on github PR comments
wcp issue fixes based on github PR comments
User Reg Server->Consent Bundle  issue fixes based on github PR comments and internal QA issue fixes for get consent api not working as expected
User Reg Server-> Enroll Mgmt  issue fixes based on github PR comments
User Reg Server-> Enroll Mgmt  issue fixes based on github PR comments
User Reg Server->User Mgmt  issue fixes based on github PR comments
removed commented code  as per the github PR comment
